    • Method Detail

      • ackInvoice

        public static void ackInvoice(BulkInvoice invoice)
        Acknowledges the given bulk invoice if it is in REQUESTING status.
        Parameters:
        invoice - the bulk invoice to ack

      • ackCheck

        public static void ackCheck(Check check)
        Acknowledges the given check if it is in REQUESTING, NOTIFYING, or PENDING TRANSFER status, or updates the status from PENDINGVOID to VOIDED or PENDINGSTOP to STOPPED.
        Parameters:
        check - the check to ack

      • ackTransaction

        public static void ackTransaction(Transaction txn)
        Acknowledges the given transaction if it is in SUBMITTING status, or it is a payment in PENDINGRECODE status. Loads the given transaction into a fresh bundle, acks it and then commits the bundle.
        Parameters:
        txn - the transaction to ack

      • ackTransactionWithNoCommit

        public static void ackTransactionWithNoCommit(Transaction txn)
        Acknowledges the given transaction if it is in SUBMITTING status, or it is a payment in PENDINGRECODE status. Just modifies the given transaction in place, does not commit a bundle.
        Parameters:
        txn - the transaction to ack

      • ackAll

        public static void ackAll()
        Acknowledges all checks and transactions awaiting acknowledgement.

      • setNewMarketRateForPair

        public static void setNewMarketRateForPair(Currency fromCurrency,
                                           Currency toCurrency,
                                           int rate)

      • setNewMarketRateForPair

        public static void setNewMarketRateForPair(Currency fromCurrency,
                                           Currency toCurrency,
                                           java.math.BigDecimal rate)

      • setNewMarketRateForPairs

        public static void setNewMarketRateForPairs(FinancialsTestUtil.MarketRateSpec[] marketRateSpecs)
